bio: John was born and raised in New York City, into a Catholic family of Italian descent. He's happily married with two kids. John graduated from MIT and is passionate about his career in technology. He spends his free time playing guitar and volunteering at local charities. His life goal is to create software that can make a positive impact on society.
visual_description: John is 6 feet tall with an athletic build. He typically dresses in casual clothing, favoring a clean and simple style. He has brown hair and blue eyes.
